Control.Name: bCrossFaction
Control.Tooltip: Enables Cross Faction Chat in Public Channels

Control.Name: bRPOnly
Control.Tooltip: Automatically Inserts the RP Marker in Filter: RP Only mode

Control.Name: bShowAll
Control.Tooltip: Automatically inserts the RP Marker in Filter: ShowAll mode

Control.Name: bFormatChat
Control.Tooltip: Applies Killroy Formatting to asterisk emotes, quotes and ooc brackets in RP channels

Control.Name: bRangeFilter
Control.Tooltip: Enables a range filter that cuts off say and emote chat based on distance from the user and occlusion. Uses Range Settings below.

Control.Name: bLegacy
Control.Tooltip: Maintains the original override colors for Killoy in Say and Emote channel (no blending.)

Control.Name: setSayColor
Control.Tooltip: Sets the IC/Quote Blend Color.

Control.Name: nICBlend
Control.Tooltip: Sets the IC Blend Amount, from channel color on the left, to override color on the right.

Control.Name: setEmoteColor
Control.Tooltip: Sets the Emote Blend Color.

Control.Name: nEmoteBlend
Control.Tooltip: Sets the Emote Blend Amount, from channel color on the left, to override color on the right.

Control.Name: setOOCColor
Control.Tooltip: Sets the OOC Blend Color.

Control.Name: nOOCBlend
Control.Tooltip: Sets the OOC Blend Amount, from channel color on the left, to override color on the right.

Control.Name: setMentionColor
Control.Tooltip: Sets the Mention Blend Color.

Control.Name: nMentionBlend
Control.Tooltip: Sets the Mention Blend Amount, from channel color on the left, to override color on the right.

Control.Name: nSayRange
Control.Tooltip: Sets the distance at which the range filter will begin to block say chat.

Control.Name: nEmoteRange
Control.Tooltip: Sets the range at which the range filter will block emotes.

Control.Name: nFalloff
Control.Tooltip: Sets the soft range in which Killroy will ease out say and chat commuincation.

Control.Name: bUseOcclusion
Control.Tooltip: Doubles the effective distance of any unit which is hidden from the player.

Control.Name: bProfanityFilter
Control.Tooltip: Enables the Profanity Filter which greeks out offensive chat.

Control.Name: bTimestamp
Control.Tooltip: Adds a timestamp to each chat line.

Control.Name: bShowChannel
Control.Tooltip: Adds the channel name to each chat line.

Control.Name: bSaveToLog
Control.Tooltip: Saves the contents of the Chat Log to file.

Control.Name: bMouseFade
Control.Tooltip: Enables Mouse Fade of the Chat Window.

Control.Name: bPCBubbles
Control.Tooltip: Enables Mouse Fade of the Chat Window.

Control.Name: bNPCBubbles
Control.Tooltip: Enables Mouse Fade of the Chat Window.

Control.Name: nOpacity
Control.Tooltip: Sets the opacity of the Chat Window when Fade is disabled only.

Control.Name: bChatLabelExt
Control.Tooltip: Maintains the original override colors for Killoy in Say and Emote channel (no blending.)

Control.Name: Aliases
Control.Tooltip: Enter your aliases here, terminating them using the ";" symbol. "<>" not required. Shown for syntax only.

Control.Name: bMentionsName
Control.Tooltip: Highlight mentions of your first or last name

Control.Name: bMentionsAlias
Control.Tooltip: Highlight mentions of your Aliases

Control.Name: ViewCheck
Control.Tooltip: Toggle Channel

Control.Name: ChannelColorBtn
Control.Tooltip: Set Channel Color

Control.Name: bRPChannel
Control.Tooltip: Enable RP Formatting

Control.Name: bNoRP
Control.Tooltip: Filter: No RP

Control.Name: bRPOnly
Control.Tooltip: Filter: RP Only

Control.Name: bAll
Control.Tooltip: Filter: Show All

Control.Text: Killroy: Per Channel Filtering in effect
Control.Name: ChatOptionsLabel7
